titleStmt.title: The sermon and prophecie of Mr. James Hunt of the county of Kent. Who professeth himselfe a prophet, which hee hath endeavoured to deliver in most churches in and about London, but since delivered in the Old-Baily. Octob. 9. 1641. / Written with his owne hand.
titleStmt.author: Hunt, James, 17th cent.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
